output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present in this post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion" as a presidential candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram targeting a potentially large audience (estimated 1,000,001+ people).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral objective. The post explicitly states "la aceste alegeri, îl voi vota pe George Simion - preşedinte" and encourages others to do the same.
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalism. It's a clear campaign message promoting a candidate.
6. Personal opinion: While structured as a personal opinion, it's being promoted as a paid advertisement with clear electoral intent.
The post is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Directly promotes George Simion for president - Uses campaign messaging and rhetoric - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Has clear electoral intent - Is run by an official AUR party page

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda as it: 1. Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate 2. Is paid advertising reaching a mass audience 3. Has clear electoral intent 4. Is published by an official party channel 5. Uses campaign messaging techniques 6. Directly calls for voting for a specific candidate
conclusion.message-for-police: AUR - Sălașu de Sus, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea și promovarea plătită a unui mesaj de propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei de campanie, folosind platforma Facebook pentru a influența direct alegătorii să voteze cu candidatul George Simion la președinție. Postarea cu ID-ul 1121044549358758 conține îndemnul explicit "la aceste alegeri, îl voi vota pe George Simion - președinte" și este distribuită ca reclamă plătită după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, atingând un public de peste 1 milion de persoane, cu un buget între 100-199 RON. Mesajul îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform Art. 36(7): identifică direct candidatul, are scop electoral explicit, se adresează publicului larg și depășește limitele activității jurnalistice.
